title: Fight League: Survivor Announces Free Mint on Ronin
description: GMonsters, a Japanese entertainment and game company, is set to launch its first NFT mint for its Fight League Survivor game on the Ronin blockchain. With the help of MIXI, the Japanese mobile game publisher that owns the Fight League IP, the free mint is scheduled for July 31, 19:00 PST, and runs for 24
